meanings.definition: An item of furniture or equipment that is fixed in a building.
meanings.sent1: The fitments in the kitchen include the cabinets and shelves.
meanings.sent2: The new house came with all the necessary fitments like lights and faucets.
meanings.sent3: The fitments in the living room decided to have a dance party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a house with various fitments, each representing a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The fitments in the workshop clanged and clattered as the workers busily assembled them.

meanings.definition: A small accessory or item of clothing.
meanings.sent1: She carefully selected the fitments for her outfit, including a matching belt and earrings.
meanings.sent2: The boutique offered a wide range of fitments such as scarves and hairpins.
meanings.sent3: The fitments in his wardrobe seemed to have a mind of their own, always getting tangled up.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the perfect fitment to complete her elegant look.
meanings.sent5: The fitments on the dress added a touch of sparkle, making it stand out in the crowd.
